column4: There's a flight 7 and sometime in the next few hours a release candidate is due if it's not out already.
:) RC1, If i am having problems in the next 30min ill just wait for that
do you know where the first hosts\mirrors will be so i can get the release candidate as soon as possible?
I would guess the archive.ubuntu.com one without a country code.  But it might get swamped, and the other official ones will be on it pretty quick.
